data.event: The ‘swishing’ event, at Baby Simple bar in Cowley Road on Saturday, was held in aid of pioneering East Oxford children’s hospice Helen & Douglas House.
Miss Cordiner said she hoped Saturday’s fundraiser, which attracted about 30 people, would be the first of many similar events.

event.title: started in America several years ago

data.event: CLOTHES swapping parties first started in America several years ago but have started coming into their own in the UK in the last two years.
